scripts.deploy:s3: npm run build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://$S3_BUCKET --delete --cache-control 'public, max-age=31536000, immutable' --exclude index.html --exclude asset-manifest.json && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://$S3_BUCKET --cache-control 'public, max-age=0, must-revalidate' && aws s3 cp build/asset-manifest.json s3://$S3_BUCKET --cache-control 'public, max-age=0, must-revalidate'
